ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 118
ygData.msgSnippet: What the hell is this crap?  Go away... far away and flame other people. One tiny side note, indifference is the true opposite of love. Rotgut
ygData.messageBody:
What the hell is this crap? Go away... far away and flame other people.

One tiny side note, indifference is the true opposite of love.

Rotgut






>Message: 12
> Date: Tue, 19 Oct 1999 04:39:22 GMT
> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>Subject: Re: Big update to the tinkering site
>
>
>You, my enemy, are a bastard. If I ever met you in real life, I would charge
>you full speed and attack you out right, I wouldn't care if you were a huge,
>700 ton sumo, or a muscle bound Goldberg-wannabe, or if you were a weak
>frail, dying old granny, or whatever. I would make a swift attampt to kick
>you with (I'd be wearing me wonderful cleats of course) all my evil hatred
>and rage I have sucesessfully built up my entire life. I'd attempt to kick
>you in the face, which, if succsessful would probably send you to the ground
>in pain, then I wouldn't stop. I'd beat you around, crush your ribs, kick
>you where it hurts till there wasn't even enough for the docters to scrap,
>making it so wouldn't ever be able to have any more bastard offspring to
>polute the world, then I'd crush your face a little more, mutilating it
>beyond reccognition, and do a little bit more for good measure. Why?
>Because, you are a bastard. I'd be one too if I did that, but frankly I
>don't care, because I hate you, bastard. Yes yes, hate. Hate is used so
>much, but it is so often not used correctly, true hate is like true love, it
>is an extremely powerful thing, but it is also extremely rare, for it is the
>exact opposite of ture love. I truely hate you. Now you look up at what I
>said I would do to you, and you ask yourself, what could cause someone to
>want to do that? Well, it was your horrible, totally unnesassary words that
>you said so horribly about me. Now, really think to yourself, do you feel
>GOOD that you said something so bad,so HORRIBLE that you made a person
>TRUELY HATE you?
>I hope you don't think this is funny because it is not at all. I hope you
>are sorry for doing that, you must be a truely horrid person if you could so
>quickly make someone hate you like you have to me. And if you think it is
>funny, or don't care, then you are a truely sick person too. People like you
>are so terribly sick, and don't deserve the very oxygen they breath. I wish
>to never hear from you again. If I never even think about you even in my
>subconcious again, it will be WAY to soon. Just get out of my life, and
>don't even bother replying to this message becasue I'm quittingthis letter
>right now so I don't have to hear from you again. I hope you are happy about
>this horrible sick, disgusting thing you have done, I hope you're real
>happy...
>
>
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>
>
>
